name: LoungeflyDoornroosje: Pin Collector Rugzak - Merchoid Nederland
description: Alle Disney-liefhebbers en pin-verzamelaars opgelet, heb je ooit moeten doen x20;offer je stijlvolle outfit of je favoriete tas om te pronken met je  begeerde verzameling spelden? Nou, vrees niet voor mijn medepinhandelaars omdat de Loungefly Pin Trader collection has got your back (literally)! And in this case, they've got your back with the Sleeping Beauty Pin Trader Backpack - the perfect bag to flaunt your pin game without causing damage to your favorite outfits and accessories.This backpack is not only practical and functional, but it's also aesthetically pleasing with its charming storybook design. It will catch the eyes of every Disney fan, with its clear front cover which allows you to display your pins in all their glory. You can finally bring your favorite Disney characters with you wherever you go, without the fear of losing or damaging them.But wait, there&rsquo;s more! This backpack is made from a super stylish and vegan-friendly (polyurethane) leather, which is not only eco-friendly but also cruelty-free. So, you can rest assured knowing that you're not harming the environment, animals or your wallet. Plus, this backpack comes with an exclusive Aurora enamel pin, making it the perfect addition to your ever-growing collection.What's more, this backpack is designed with the convenience of the pin-obsessed in mind, with perforated details that allow for easy pinning. That means no more struggling to maneuver tiny backings or potential injuries from those pesky pin pricks. Plus, the backpack straps are adjustable, padded and comfortable, so you can show off your pins in comfort and style. And inside, you'll find a handy zipper pocket that lets you access the perforated vegan leather without having to fumble around searching for your favorite pin. If you're a Disney fan who loves collecting pins, this backpack is an essential addition to your wardrobe. It&rsquo;s an officially licensed Disney product and the coordinating pattern of the inside lining fabric is just the cherry on top of this cute and practical package. And whoever said "you can't have it all" clearly never saw the Sleeping Beauty Pin Trader Backpack.Bullet points:- No need to sacrifice style or accessories to display your pins- Vegan-friendly, eco-friendly and cruelty-free- Perforated details for easy pinning- Adjustable and padded backpack straps for comfort- Zipper pocket to access your pins without rummaging through your bag- Coordinating pattern of the inside lining fabric for added style- Includes an exclusive Aurora enamel pinProduct DetailsProduct type: BackpackLicense: Sleeping BeautyManufacturer: LoungeflySpecificaties Land van herkomst: China Materialen: Kunstleer (polyurethaan) SKU: WDBK2063GTIN: 671803400559
